homePage.crawlingContent1: Great! It seems like you just installed Kimitzu.
homePage.crawlingContent2: Please come back later as Kimitzu crawls the listings on the network.
homePage.noResultsContent: Your search did not match any listings.
noResultsSuggestions: Try a different search keyword or filter.
Make sure that all words are spelled correctly.

tosPage.tos:
The Kimitzu community of developers has worked hard to deliver a free market for services. But as with any software, there will be bugs. Kimitzu users may also encounter trolls, spammers, thieves, and other bad actors while using the app. Kimitzu developers will continuously work to provide tools to users that will help them identify, block, and remove bad actors from the Kimitzu ecosystem. However, these tools may fail at times. The developers are not responsible for any monetary loss associated with the software.

 Due to the global, peer-to-peer, censorship-resistant nature of Kimitzu, users may see listings for services that are not currently legal in their jurisdiction. It is the responsibility of Kimitzu users to ensure that they are in compliance with the laws of their jurisdiction.

The only information users are required to provide is a handle and country. Kimitzu developers have also made a good faith effort to help users maintain their privacy while using Kimitzu. However, Kimitzu is experimental software, and there may be flaws that reveal sensitive information. It's also easy to de-anonymize oneself, such as by talking about one's personal life with a client, or describing oneself in too much detail. There are also many adversaries--such as governments or criminals--who work to defeat Kimitzu's privacy mechanisms. Therefore, Kimitzu developers do not make any guarantees regarding the ability of the software to maintain user privacy.

listingForm.tagsHelper: Use tags to enhance search visibility of your listing.
listingForm.termsAndConditionsDescriptor: If left blank, the listing will display "No terms and conditions entered"
listingForm.moderatorsHelper1: It seems like you have no favorite moderators setup.

listingForm.currenciesDescriptor: Accepting more coins will attract more customers.
listingForm.abandonPrompt: Your changes will not be saved. Continue?

notifications.cannotEdit: Unable to edit listing that you do not own!

moderatorSelectionForm.crawlingNotif1: It is taking a while to crawl the network for available moderators.
moderatorSelectionForm.crawlingNotif2: Please wait a little longer or come back later.
moderatorSelectionForm.searchPlaceholder: Search by moderator name or ID

profilePage.profileNotFoundSubText: The profile you requested is currently offline or does not exist in the Kimitzu network.

settingsPage.changeCredMsgTextA:
Enabling this feature will activate Kimitzu's authentication mechanisms to protect
your client from unauthorized access.
settingsPage.changeCredMsgTextB:
Other non-critical features such as search will still be accessible but payment and
ordering-related features will need authentication in order to proceed.

deactivateAuthForm.helper1: This will deactivate Kimitzu's authentication mechanisms and your client will no longer be protected from unauthorized access.
deactivateAuthForm.helper2: Payment and ordering-related features will no longer need authentication in order to proceed.

miscForm.saveErrorNotif: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
miscForm.crashReportHelper: Send crash reports to the developers
miscForm.autoUpdatesHelper: Updates will be downloaded and installed automatically

settingsPage.credentialsUpdateSuccessNotif:
Credentials successfully deleted!
Please restart the server for changes to take effect.
settingsPage.authUpdateSuccessNotif:
New credentials accepted!
Please restart the server for changes to take effect.

blockedNodesCard.unblockErrorNotif: Failed to unblock peer. Please try again later.

orderHistoryPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, order #, or vendor

orderViewPage.cancelPromptParagraph: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
orderViewPage.cancelOrderActionParagraph: The vendor may be offline and has not yet confirmed the order. You may cancel this order and return the funds back to your account.
orderViewPage.cancelOrderText: Order has been cancelled by the buyer.

disputeForm.claimPlaceholder: Prepare a suitable claim that has the most relevant evidence. This can help ensure you have the greatest possible chance of a dispute being found in your favor.

orderViewPage.orderProcessErrorParagraph: There was an error processing this order.
orderViewPage.disputeExpiredParagraph: Time is up! The moderator failed to make a decision in time. The vendor can now claim the funds.
orderViewPage.disputingParagraph: The order is being disputed. The moderator has approximately an hour to process the dispute and make a decision.
orderViewPage.disputeOrderParagraph1: This order can be disputed for 6 blocks or approximately an hour. The clock will start when the funding payment is confirmed.
orderViewPage.disputeOrderParagraph2: Once the clock expires, the vendor can claim payment and finalize the order without support from the moderator.
orderViewPage.orderAcceptedParagraph2: and can fulfill it whenever you're ready.
orderViewPage.orderAcceptedParagraph3: Your order is now being processed...
orderViewPage.awaitingPaymentHeader: Waiting for buyer to send payment...
orderViewPage.awaitingPaymentParagraph: Buyer has not yet paid the order.
orderViewPage.orderAcceptedParagraph: The vendor has accepted the order

paymentQRCard.paymentConfirmationText: The amount will be deducted from your wallet.
paymentQRCard.paymentHelper: Once you have paid, it may take a bit for the interface to update.

disputeViewPage.disputeExpiredParagraph: Time is up! You failed to make a decision in time. The vendor can now claim the funds.
disputeViewPage.disputedNoteParagraph: You have an hour to process the dispute and make a decision.

walletView.receiveTransactionHeader: Receive money by scanning this QR Code.

additionalForm.memoPlaceholder: Provide additional details for the vendor (Optional)

checkoutPage.listingOwnerHelper: This is how your listing looks like to other users.
checkoutPage.receivedPaymentLink: Check the status of your order.

paymentCard.checkoutHelper2: Clicking will advance you to the payment step

moderatorForm.descriptionPlaceholder: In 500 words or less tell us something about yourself and the services you offer...

socialMediaForm.proofTooltip: Link of a proof that you own that account (e.g. link of a post for facebook and link of a commit in github).

educationForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about your degree and specialization

employmentForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about your work

listingPage.expiredListingHelper1: This listing has expired, contact the vendor for more details.
listingPage.deleteListingPromptText: Are you sure you want to delete this listing? This action cannot be undone.

notFoundComponent.paragraph: The listing you requested has either expired on the Kimitzu network or does not exist.

unfunded.description: Orders that have not yet paid by the buyer.

pending.description: Orders that were paid and sent to the vendor but the vendor has not yet responded.

processing.description: Orders that were fully paid and vendor is processing the order.

fulfilled.description: Orders that were fulfilled by the vendor.

completed.description: Orders that were completed by the buyer.

refunded.description: Orders that were refunded by the vendor.

cancelled.description: Orders that were canceled by the buyer or that were refused by the vendor.

orderConfirmOffline.message: This order was made when you were offline, accept order?
